using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.TryCatch.Input
{

	public abstract partial class AbstractAutoProperty
	{

		public Task<int> TestAsync()
		{
			try
			{
				return Success ? Task.FromResult<int>(1 ): Task.FromResult<int>(0);
			}
			catch (Exception ex)
			{
				return Task.FromException<int>(ex);
			}
		}

		public Task Test2Async()
		{
			try
			{
				Success = true;
				return Task.CompletedTask;
			}
			catch (Exception ex)
			{
				return Task.FromException<object>(ex);
			}
		}

		public Task<AbstractAutoProperty> CreateAsync()
		{
			return Task.FromResult<AbstractAutoProperty>(new AbstractAutoPropertyImpl
			{
				Success = true
			});
		}
	}
}
